ygData.subject: Re: Cast Force, where?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen that spell in the great library of Euridn, the Academy of Magic in Freeport, and the Library Mechanamagica of Ak Anon.  Ususally, just one NPC is
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen that spell in the great library of Euridn, the Academy of Magic
in Freeport, and the Library Mechanamagica of Ak'Anon. Ususally, just one
NPC is carrying 5 spells, and they are the next 5 DD spells starting at 24th
;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard
